CustomField.formula: IF( TEXT($User.Train_Service__c) == TEXT(Carrier__c) || (TEXT(Carrier__c) == "Blue" && TEXT($User.Train_Service__c) == "Purple") || (TEXT(Carrier__c) == "Red" && TEXT($User.Train_Service__c) == "Purple") || (TEXT(Carrier__c) == "Purple" && NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT($User.Train_Service__c)))), TRUE, FALSE)
CustomField.label: User's Service Team
